citations.narrative:
Item Miscellaneous 2.38 b 1 ii
At the time of inspection the facility could not produce for inspection the IACUC records or the program of vet care
because personnel were not available.
Facility needs to establish a system in which records are readily available for review during inspection
Correct by 12/25/14
Exit interview conducted a the end of inspection
